column3: Binger welcome back to field work!
column4: It's been a while so I'll go over the basics in case you forgot.
column5: In the Top-Left of your HUD, you'll see your health and hunger bars.
column6: Remember if your hunger drops to zero, your health will start to decay.
column7: Luckily, this building has a lot of food everywhere. You can eat food that you pick up in order to relieve your hunger level.
column8: Looks like the elevator has no power. You need to find a way to turn it on.
column9: The door to your right looks like it’s locked. You’ll need to find a key. Try the room on your right.

column3: Binger, this floor seems to have some different foods to the previous one. These foods make great projectiles. Good for defeating your foes at range.
column4: I know parting with food is a foreign concept to you, but please give it a try."
column5: Oh, and remember, you can only hold one food item at a time.

column3: You can use the food to attack enemies. Give it a go now!
column4: Pick up the beef, get close to the target, and press [Key/Button] to hit them with it.

column3: Careful Binger! Remember what I said about hunger.
column4: Pick up that {melee food item} and press [key/Button] to eat it.

column3: Quick, that guard hasn’t spotted you yet. Hide!
column4: You can hide behind objects by {walking behind them and pressing [key]}.

column3: I'm surprised that tree hid you, given it's only the size of your arm... I guess believing in yourself really IS the key to success!
column4: You still need to turn on the {escalator}. Explore the rest of the floor and see what you can find.
column5: Now that you've remembered the basics, make your way to the next floor. Also, for some reason, like an escalator, each elevator only goes between 2 floors. Have fun with that!!

column3: Binger, this floor seems to have some different foods to the previous one. These foods make great projectiles. Good for defeating your foes at range.
column4: I know parting with food is a foreign concept to you, but please give it a try."
column5: Oh, and remember, you can only hold one food item at a time.

column3: Practice throwing the food at the businessmen in the next room. Pick up the {projectile food item} and press [Key/Button] to throw it.
Careful you don’t get spotted, Binger. Businessmen don’t take kindly to outsiders
column4: They also look busy so might try to get rid of you quickly.

column3: Nice throw! He doesn't even know what hit hi- BINGER, DON'T EVEN THINK OF EATING THAT OFF OF HIM!
column4: Right, time to make your way to the elevator. Be careful, My sensors are showing something strange on the floor above you.
